title: Beautiful city!
text: A very beautiful city!the architecture of the buildings in the old city is amazing and gives a special character to the old part of the city!the only thinks that I didn’t like is the new part of the city!

title: Great experience!
text: It was an amazing experience!i saw a big part of the Athenian and Greek history!It s a modern building in a very beautiful street with a great view to the acropolis rocks and to the Parthenon!

title: Disappointed
text:
Our communication with Michael matched his company’s logo, it was Amazing, so we were expecting an amazing time. Unfortunately our tour was not up to our expectations. It was basically an expensive taxi service with the driver taking us from location to location with minimum information provided. We were disappointed…

Not up to our expectations…

title: Amazing food!
text: Greek food!special plates! Everything there has an amazing taste! I highly recommend it! You have to try their salads anyway! Staff and owners were very friendly with us!

title: An absolute must see!!
text: An absolute must see. A breathtaking piece of history that comes to life right before your eyes. The 360 view is spectacular too. Make sure to reach the site early in the morning, upon opening, otherwise you will find it crowded. Unfortunately our driver did not warn us about this and we spent valuable time waiting and waiting. Look out for the slippery steps and make sure to have water with you.
